DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether fix combination orphenadrine , acetaminophen , caffeine diclofenac sodium effective treatment acute episode mechanical postural low back pain Voltaren® . Will randomize 110 participant sex , age 18 year old less 65 year age acute episode mechanical postural low back pain allocate one two treatment group : Group 1 : Fixed combination orphenadrine , acetaminophen , caffeine diclofenac sodium ; Group 2 : Voltaren®
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Superiority Fixed Combination ( Orfenadrine 35mg , Acetaminophen 325mg , Caffeine 65mg Diclofenac Sodium 50mg ) Compared Voltaren® ( Diclofenac Sodium 50mg ) Treatment Acute Postural Low Back Pain .
